arts.ttl: Premier League issue explanation after referee overrules VAR in rare incident
arts.sum: Referee Darren England took the rare decision to go against a VAR review and stuck to his original decision when he denied Fulham a penalty during their loss to Everton

arts.ttl: Quickfire double earns Everton victory at European hopefuls Fulham
arts.sum: Two goals in three minutes from Michael Keane and Beto earned the Toffees a 3-1 win.

arts.ttl: Fulham 1-3 Everton: Highlights, man of the match, stats as David Moyes guides the Toffees to impressive comeback win
arts.sum: Everton come from behind to record a 3-1 victory over Fulham in Saturday afternoon's Premier League contest at Craven Cottage.

arts.ttl: Southampton v Manchester City, Fulham v Everton, and more: football – live
arts.sum: Follow goal and news updates from around the grounds Live scores | Tables | And you can drop Barry an email League One playoff: Stockport County have gone ahead at Brisbane Road, with Norwood turning provider to tee up Fraser Horsfall for a back post header from close range that gives the visitors the advantage. League One playoff: Leyton Orient took the lead against Stockport County in their semi-final first leg courtesy of Charlie Kelman’s first-half strike, but the visitors have just equalised after Oliver Norwood scored from the spot. There’s about 30 minutes to play at Brisbane Road. Wycombe Wanderers and Charlton Athletic will contest the first leg of their semi-final at Adams Park tomorrow. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Fulham vs. Everton: Preview, Predictions and Lineups
arts.sum: Fulham host Everton in the Premier League on Saturday. Preview includes team news, how to watch on TV, score prediction and more.

arts.ttl: Marco Silva addresses Fulham future & delivers injury update ahead of Everton clash
arts.sum: Fulham manager Marco Silva addresses rumours linking him with the Al-Hilal job while also providing an injury update ahead of Saturday's clash with Everton.

arts.ttl: Team News: Fulham vs. Everton injury, suspension list, predicted XIs
arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up all of the latest injury and suspension news ahead of Saturday's Premier League clash between Fulham and Everton.
Marco Silva expects the topsy-turvy nature of the battle for European football to continue right until the end of the season.

arts.ttl: Premier League: Predictions for all 10 weekend games
arts.sum: James Mason has picked out a score prediction for all 10 Premier League games taking place this weekend.
